LanguageData.MechanoidTeleport_Generator.label: Mechanoid portal generator
LanguageData.MechanoidTeleport_Generator.description: It seems that there is something inside that generates enough energy to support the teleport.
LanguageData.MechanoidTeleport.label: Mechanoid portal
LanguageData.MechanoidTeleport.description: The hole in space generated by the generator. Allows mechanoids on that side to cross here without obstacles
LanguageData.HiveCrack.label: Hive crach
LanguageData.HiveCrack.description: Tunnel leading to the underground hive of cave spiders, through which they get out
